Key:
All right, I'm going to go check in on the Yamai
Sisters.
I came to help. How are things here?

*Grunt*... You evil ball-shaped bastard! I won't
be defeated by you. I will rise again and again
until I blast you to pieces!

Assumption. The carrots and potatoes in the pot
have softened. Kaguya, when are the onions
coming?
Wait, Yuzuru. My eyes...! My eyes...!

Switch. Yuzuru will handle the onions. Kaguya,
please prepare the ground meat. Sake, soy
sauce, and mirin...
Grr... I'll hand it over to you, Yuzuru.
Addition. Please put butter in the frying pan.
...Y-You guys seem busy.

Shido! Step back. Unfortunately we don't have time
for you right now.
Oh, sorry.
Passing. I am passing by. Please move, Shido.
S-Sorry...

Yuzuru! I'm done! I've prepared myself for the
burning flames that will wear these ingredients
down to my liking.
U-Um... Is there anything I can help you with?

Medium flame. I am going to pan-fry the onions.
Kaguya, please put the ingredients in a bowl.
Leave it to me!

Now, prepare a frying pan for baking the eggs in
the stove.

Bwahahaha. We can now see the shape of the Golden
Artifact.

Switch. The onion is starting to brown. Kaguya,
please just put in the ground meat and mix.
Understood. Leave the seasoning to me.

Warning. Please do it after mixing the ingredients
in the bowl.

I know that! It's totally fine! Anyways, hurry up
and do the eggs, Yuzuru!
They seem busy...
(...I guess I should just sit and watch.)
